Class Jabber::VCard
In: lib/jabber4r/vcard.rb
Parent: Object

The VCard class holds the parsed VCard data from the Jabber service.

from_element(je)

Factory to create the VCard from the ParsedXMLElement

return:[Jabber::VCard] The newly created VCard.
